sense.def:
To impress someone
pomeni nekoga pripraviti do tega, da nas občuduje in spoštuje.

seg.quote: I was hoping to impress my new boss with my diligence.
I was greatly impressed by the pianist.

sense.def:
To impress something on someone
pomeni nekoga pripraviti do tega, da razume pomen nečesa;

seg.quote: She impressed on the Government the danger of making too many cuts.
